entry.title: Sunday night: A few rain showers or flurries. Low zero.
entry.summary: A few rain showers or flurries ending early this evening then cloudy with a few rain showers or flurries beginning near midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 5.

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the evening with 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening and overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 12 February 2023
